parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The absence of a second rear reverse light can increase the risk of accidents or injuries, particularly at night, as pedestrians or other drivers may not be aware of the vehicle reversing.
symptoms: Only one rear reverse light is operational
the passenger side does not have a port or wires for a reverse light
difficulty seeing when backing up at night
increased risk of accidents or injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected shattering of the sunroof can cause a loud noise, potentially startling the driver and leading to loss of control of the vehicle, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Loud popping or gunshot-like sound
sudden and unexpected shattering of the sunroof glass
sunroof glass shattering from the inside out
edges of the glass near the weather stripping pulled away in an awkward manner.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The internal failure of the transmission can cause unpredictable and erratic behavior, including sudden acceleration, rolling backwards, bucking, surging, gear slippage, and hesitation to shift, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Loud whining or grinding noise from the transmission
sudden acceleration in reverse
rolling backwards at stop lights or signs
bucking or surging at low speed
gear slippage
excessive and unpredictable engine braking
hesitation to shift
hesitation and rough shifting upon re-acceleration
shifter sticking in park.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Transmission Control Module (TCM) can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to erratic shifting, hesitation, and loss of control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Stability control light and ABS light illuminated
transmission slipping or hesitation
engine missing or misfiring
unpredictable engine braking
hesitation to shift
hesitation and rough shifting upon re-acceleration.
